dialogues.speaker: Otis
dialogues.text: Oh hello there son. I haven't seen visitors around here lately. I am Otis grandmaster alchemist and historian of this village. Can I help you?

dialogues.speaker: Otis
dialogues.text: You must be his nephew... He told me you were coming. Unfortunately you uncle isn't in town anymore.

options.text: Wait! You knew I was coming?

dialogues.speaker: Otis
dialogues.text: Yes that is true, but I have seen him since... Do you know of the happenings?

options.text: What does that have to do with my uncle?

dialogues.speaker: Otis
dialogues.text: Its hard to explain it, as its not just one thing, bizarre sounds, people missing, belongings stolen, everybody in town has had different unexplained issues arise.

options.text: What does that have to do with my uncle?

dialogues.speaker: Otis
dialogues.text: Well... He 'left' or 'disappeared' depending on who you ask just as things started getting bad around here.

dialogues.speaker: Otis
dialogues.text: I am saying I need you help. Last time I saw Arthur he led be to believe someone or something is behind all of this. IF we solve that mystery we may just find your uncle. Will you help me?

options.text: I really didnt come here to get involved.

dialogues.speaker: Otis
dialogues.text: Well. that's the problem, He didnt really give me anywhere to start. Maybe work with the other villages maybe their issues will lead you to the larger cause

dialogues.speaker: Otis
dialogues.text: He may be in trouble but I understand, Come to me if you change your mind son.

dialogues.speaker: Otis
dialogues.text: I sure hope you can find your uncle son.

dialogues.speaker: Otis
dialogues.text: Hi, There sorry I am much to busy to talk at the moment.

dialogues.speaker: Otis
dialogues.text: I know you are looking for your Uncle but his disappearance seems to coincide with the other strange phenomenon occuring in the village, Maybe if you investigate those occurence we can learn something about you uncle complete 3 villager requests

dialogues.speaker: Otis
dialogues.text: Try speaking with the merchant's boy Oliver
